response.overview: A girl who halfheartedly tries to be part of the "in crowd" of her school meets a rebel who teaches her a more devious way to play social politics: by killing the popular kids.
response.tagline: Best friends, social trends, and occasional murder.
response.title: Heathers

titles.title: Heathers - Häxor, läxor och dödliga lektioner
